attributes.action: Suspend Council Tax payments to ease financial hardship during Covid19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
The impact of the Covid19 pandemic will cause financial hardship to many families due to loss of income and/ or additional costs.
Help to ease the burden on households by suspending Council Tax payments for 3 months.
attributes.background: Suspend Council Tax payments for 3 months to ease the financial strain on households during the Covid19 pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
